name: AstroJump (NeneWolf)
description:
AstroJump is a simple infinite horizontal running made in a week for a summer camp project.

To play the game, use A and D to move left and right, and press P to bring the pause menu.

Main objective : Avoid the booms and reach your highest score on all 3 difficulties! 

Assets used:  
- 113 2D Item Icons by Mimu Studio
- Free Pixel Front by Tiny Worlds
- 2D Casual UI HD by Minu Studio
- 2D Character - Astronaut by CopySpright
